AND (T2.PRJT_CFRM_YN='Y') AND (T2.PRJT_END_YN is null or T2.PRJT_END_YN='N')

mapper.select: SELECT /* selectCntPrjtMgt */ COUNT(1) FROM T_PMS001 T1, T_PMS006 T2 WHERE T1.TR_ACCT_CD=T2.TR_ACCT_CD

SELECT T1.TR_ACCT_CD trAcctCd, T1.TR_ACCT_NM trAcctNm, T2.PRJT_CD prjtCd, T2.PRJT_NM prjtNm, T2.CSTMR_NM cstmrNm, T2.PRJT_CFRM_DT prjtCfrmDt, T2.PRJT_CFRM_YN prjtCfrmYn, T2.PRJT_END_DT prjtEndDt, T2.PRJT_END_YN prjtEndYn, T2.WORK_START_DT workStartDt, T2.WORK_END_DT workEndDt, T2.ABRD_CD abrdCd, (SELECT DTL_CD_NM FROM T_PMS023 WHERE GRP_CD = '005' AND DTL_CD = T2.ABRD_CD) abrdCdNm, T2.PRJT_PRPTY_CD prjtPrptyCd, (SELECT DTL_CD_NM FROM T_PMS023 WHERE GRP_CD = '012' AND DTL_CD = T2.PRJT_PRPTY_CD) prjtPrptyCdNm, T2.PRJT_GRND_DESC prjtGrndDesc, T2.MEMO_DESC memoDesc FROM T_PMS001 T1, T_PMS006 T2 WHERE T1.TR_ACCT_CD=T2.TR_ACCT_CD AND T2.PRJT_CD = #{prjtCd}

SELECT T1.TR_ACCT_CD trAcctCd, T1.PRJT_CD prjtCd, T2.CHGR_SEQ_NO chgrSeqNo, T2.CHG_SECT_CD, (SELECT DTL_CD_NM FROM T_PMS023 WHERE GRP_CD = '001' AND DTL_CD = T2.CHG_SECT_CD) chgSectNm, T2.CHGR_NM chgrNm, T2.PSTN_NM pstnNm, T2.TEL_NO telNo, T2.HP_NO hpNo, T2.EMAIL_ADDR emailAddr FROM T_PMS006 T1 INNER JOIN T_PMS002 T2 ON (T1.TR_ACCT_CD=T2.TR_ACCT_CD AND T2.CHGR_SEQ_NO=T1.SALES_CHGR_SEQ_NO) WHERE T1.PRJT_CD =#{prjtCd} ORDER BY T2.CHGR_SEQ_NO DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT T1.TR_ACCT_CD trAcctCd, T1.PRJT_CD prjtCd, T2.CHGR_SEQ_NO chgrSeqNo, T2.CHG_SECT_CD, (SELECT DTL_CD_NM FROM T_PMS023 WHERE GRP_CD = '001' AND DTL_CD = T2.CHG_SECT_CD) chgSectNm, T2.CHGR_NM chgrNm, T2.PSTN_NM pstnNm, T2.TEL_NO telNo, T2.HP_NO hpNo, T2.EMAIL_ADDR emailAddr FROM T_PMS006 T1 INNER JOIN T_PMS002 T2 ON (T1.TR_ACCT_CD=T2.TR_ACCT_CD AND T2.CHGR_SEQ_NO=T1.CAL_CHGR_SEQ_NO) WHERE T1.PRJT_CD =#{prjtCd} ORDER BY T2.CHGR_SEQ_NO DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_PMS006( PRJT_CD, PRJT_NM, ABRD_CD, PRJT_PRPTY_CD, CSTMR_NM, WORK_START_DT, WORK_END_DT, PRJT_GRND_DESC, MEMO_DESC, TR_ACCT_CD, SALES_CHGR_SEQ_NO, CAL_CHGR_SEQ_NO, RGT_TM, RGTR_ID, UPT_TM, UPTR_ID ) VALUES ( (SELECT CONCAT('P', DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y'), LPAD(CAST(IFNULL(MAX(SUBSTR(PRJT_CD, 6, 3))+1, 1) AS CHAR), 3, '0')) FROM T_PMS006 ALIAS_FOR_SUBQUERY WHERE SUBSTR(PRJT_CD, 2, 4) = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y')), #{prjtNm}, #{abrdCd}, #{prjtPrptyCd}, #{cstmrNm}, #{workStartDt}, #{workEndDt}, #{prjtGrndDesc}, #{memoDesc}, #{trAcctCd}, #{chgSeqNo1}, #{chgSeqNo2}, NOW(), #{rgtrId}, NOW(), #{uptrId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE T_PMS006 SET PRJT_NM=#{prjtNm}, ABRD_CD=#{abrdCd}, PRJT_PRPTY_CD=#{prjtPrptyCd}, CSTMR_NM=#{cstmrNm}, WORK_START_DT=#{workStartDt}, WORK_END_DT=#{workEndDt}, PRJT_GRND_DESC=#{prjtGrndDesc}, MEMO_DESC=#{memoDesc}, TR_ACCT_CD=#{trAcctCd}, SALES_CHGR_SEQ_NO=#{chgSeqNo1}, CAL_CHGR_SEQ_NO=#{chgSeqNo2}, UPT_TM=NOW(), UPTR_ID=#{uptrId} WHERE PRJT_CD = #{prjtCd}
